title: Slovakia Banks Balance Sheet
description: Banks Balance Sheet in Slovakia decreased to 113891 EUR Million in September from 113947 EUR Million in August of 2022. Banks Balance Sheet in Slovakia averaged 69887.17 EUR Million from 2006 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 113947 EUR Million in August of 2022 and a record low of 47103 EUR Million in February of 2006. This page provides the latest reported value for - Slovakia Banks Balance Sheet - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: National Bank of Slovakia
